name: Amumu
title: the Sad Mummy
lore: Legend claims that Amumu is a lonely and melancholy soul from ancient Shurima, roaming the world in search of a friend. Doomed by an ancient curse to remain alone forever, his touch is death, his affection ruin. Those who claim to have seen him describe a living cadaver, small in stature and wrapped in creeping bandages. Amumu has inspired myths, songs, and folklore told and retold for generationsâ€”such that it is impossible to separate truth from fiction.
blurb: Legend claims that Amumu is a lonely and melancholy soul from ancient Shurima, roaming the world in search of a friend. Doomed by an ancient curse to remain alone forever, his touch is death, his affection ruin. Those who claim to have seen him describe...
allytips: Amumu is highly dependent on teammates, so try laning with your friends for maximum effectiveness.
Cooldown Reduction on Amumu is very strong, but it's often difficult to itemize for it. Grab the Golem buff whenever possible to gain Cooldown Reduction without sacrificing stats.
Despair is very effective against other tanks, so make sure you're in range of opponents with the highest Health.
enemytips: Avoid bunching up with other allies when Amumu has his ultimate available.
Erratic movement, or hiding behind creep waves can make it difficult for Amumu to instigate a fight with Bandage Toss.
Amumu's Despair makes purchasing primarily Health items a risky proposition.

riot_spells.name: Bandage Toss
riot_spells.description: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
riot_spells.tooltip: Launches a bandage in a direction. If it hits an enemy unit, Amumu pulls himself to them, dealing {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage and stunning for {{ e2 }} second.

riot_spells.name: Despair
riot_spells.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curses</font> refreshed.
riot_spells.tooltip: Toggle: Amumu cries, refreshing Curses on nearby enemies and dealing magic damage equal to {{ e2 }} plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their maximum health each second.

riot_spells.name: Tantrum
riot_spells.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Passive: Amumu takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})(+{{ f2 }}) reduced physical damage.

Active: Amumu tantrums, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding units. Basic attacks that hit Amumu reduce Tantrum's cooldown by 0.5 seconds.

Tantrum's passive effect increases in potency with bonus Armor and Magic Resist.

riot_spells.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
riot_spells.description: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, applying his <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curse</font>, damaging them and rendering them unable to attack or move.
riot_spells.tooltip: Amumu entangles nearby enemy units, dealing {{ rcalculateddamage }} magic damage and applying Curse. Entangled enemies are unable to attack or move for {{ rduration }} seconds.

riot_passive.name: Cursed Touch
riot_passive.description: Amumu's basic attacks <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curse</font> his enemies, causing them to take bonus true damage from incoming magic damage.

i1.name: Cursed Touch
i1.blurb: Amumu's basic attacks Curse enemies for 3 seconds, causing them to take 10% bonus true damage from any magic damage dealt to them.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Amumu's''' basic attacks and {{ai|Curse of the Sad Mummy|Amumu}} apply a {{as|Curse|buzzword}} for 3 seconds, refreshing with each subsequent basic attack.
i1.description2: {{as|Cursed|buzzword}} targets receive {{tip|true damage|{{as|10% '''bonus''' true damage}}}} from all incoming {{as|magic damage}}, calculated before {{sti|{{as|magic resistance}}}} reduction.
i1.notes: * If '''Amumu''' has on-hit magic damage, the bonus true damage will be applied even against non-Cursed targets, as the Curse applies before the magic damage.

q1.name: Bandage Toss
q1.blurb: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Amumu''' tosses a bandage in the target direction that {{tip|stun|stuns}} the first enemy it hits for 1 second, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and {{tip|dash|pulling}} him to their location.
q1.description2: '''Amumu''' is unable to attack while ''Bandage Toss'' is in flight.
q1.description3: '''''Amumu''' will attempt to automatically basic attack his target at the end of the dash.''
q1.notes:
* ''Bandage Toss'' follows his target for up to 2000 units from where he cast ''Bandage Toss'', in case targets get out of the stun before he arrives.
* ''Bandage Toss'' cannot be cast while '''Amumu''' is {{tip|root|rooted}}.
* Crowd control effects will not prevent '''Amumu''' from dashing if they hit him before the skill shot hits. However, the duration of the crowd control can persist the duration of the dash.
* While '''Amumu''' is mid-dash, only knock-abouts crowd control effects will prevent him from reaching his target. Other forms of crowd control will still be applied, but they will not hinder his movement.
* ''Bandage Toss'' can hit stealthed targets.
* ''Bandage Toss'' does not fizzle on '''Amumu's''' death, and it can still stun and damage enemies.
* '''Amumu''' is still able to dash even if ''Bandage Toss'' is blocked by [[spell shield]]s.
* The projectile does not interrupt '''Amumu's''' orders and will adjust its direction based on '''Amumu's''' position.
* If ''Bandage Toss'' is used beyond '''Amumu's''' basic attack range, the auto attack following will not grant any stack of {{ri|Conqueror}}, {{ri|Electrocute}}, {{ri|Phase Rush}} or {{ii|Spellthief's Edge}}.

w1.name: Despair
w1.blurb: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their Curses refreshed.
w1.description: {{sbc|Toggle:}} '''Amumu''' cries a continuous pool of tears, refreshing {{as|Curse|buzzword}} for 3 seconds and dealing {{as|magic damage}} every half second to nearby enemies.
w1.leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Half Second|{{ap|5 to 15}} {{as|(+ {{ap|0.5 to 1}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.5}}% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
w1.notes:
* ''Despair'' has a minimum duration of 1 second.
* Despite the rounding in ''Despair's'' tooltip, it will do increased damage for every point of {{tt|ability power|+0.005% per 1 AP}}.
* ''Despair'' cannot be toggled-off while [[crowd control|unable to activate abilities]].
* Toggled abilities do not count as ability activation for the purposes of effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}} or {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.

e1.name: Tantrum
e1.blurb: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.
e1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Amumu''' takes reduced post-mitigation damage from each tick of {{as|physical damage}}.
e1.leveling: {{st|Physical Damage Reduction|{{ap|2 to 10}} {{as|(+ 3% '''bonus''' armor)}} {{as|(+ 3% '''bonus''' magic resistance)}}}}
e1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Amumu''' releases his anger, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies.
e1.description3: ''Tantrum's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by {{fd|0.5}} seconds every time '''Amumu''' is hit by a basic attack.
e1.notes:
* Tower attacks reduce ''Tantrum's'' cooldown.
* ''Tantrum's'' cooldown reduction will trigger multiple times for effects such as {{ai|Double Strike|Master Yi}}.

r1.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
r1.blurb: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, applying his Curse, damaging them and rendering them unable to attack or move.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Amumu''' {{tip|entangle|entangles}} surrounding enemies for 2 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and applying {{as|Curse|buzzword}} for 3 seconds.
